segments.text: Hello ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi Vicky .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you there yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just got off the subway . I'm almost there . Sorry I'm late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's no problem . I just wanted to tell you I'm inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On the second floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I come to the second floor or do you want to come to the first floor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come upstairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Can you hear me OK ? I said , come to the second floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , OK . What are you doing there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just looking at some books on how to learn English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to get something to eat later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm still full from dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know for sure . When you get here we'll talk about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , see you soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bye .
segments.speaker: S2
